DataElement.preferredDefinition: A count of the number of months the orthodontist recommends the patient use the removable retainer on their maxillary arch immediately after receiving it

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Orthodontist Removable Maxilla  Retainer Device Component Initial Treatment Regimen  Recommendation
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The orthodontist recommends that the way the patient use the removable retainer on their maxillary arch immediately after receiving it should be continued with no foreseeable end date
